title: Videos Show Moments in Which Agents Killed a Man in Minneapolis
summary: Federal authorities said the slain man, Alex Pretti, had approached agents with a gun. But videos show Mr. Pretti was holding his phone, not a weapon, when they pulled him to the ground.

title: Alex Jeffrey Pretti Knew He Wanted to Help Others
summary: Shot and killed by immigration agents on a Minneapolis street, he wanted to be a ‘force of good in the world.’

title: Scenes From the Winter Storm
summary: Images from across much of the country illuminate snow-covered streets and preparations for worse still to come.

title: New York’s Latest Forecast Shows Heavy Snow, Then Sleet
summary: The National Weather Service said Central Park could see up to a foot of snow by Monday.

title: Trump Threatens Canada With Tariffs as Post-Davos Fallout Continues
summary: President Trump said he would impose tariffs if Canada made “a deal with China,” though there is no sign that those countries are discussing a broad trade agreement.

title: What Europe Learned From the Greenland Crisis
summary: Territorial integrity is a core tenet of Europe that is at risk from Russian and American imperialism. Brussels has fought back.

title: As Trump Focuses Abroad, G.O.P. Toils to Hone Election Message
summary: A new poll shows that voters who will decide control of Congress see a lack of presidential emphasis on critical domestic issues.

title: Low Rates Sound Great. But a Trump Fed Could Cause a Painful ‘Sugar High.’
summary: Dropping rates more than conditions warrant would stimulate the economy in the short term but could lead to trouble, our columnist says.

title: Should New Dietary Guidelines Change How You Eat? Your Biggest Questions, Answered.
summary: New federal nutrition advice has caused some confusion and controversy.

title: Genetic Data From Over 20,000 U.S. Children Misused for ‘Race Science’
summary: The National Institutes of Health failed to protect brain scans that an international group of fringe researchers used to argue for the intellectual superiority of white people.

title: The Un-American President
summary: Our national mosaic, crushed beneath the ICE.

title: Democrats Running for U.S. Senate in Texas Call for Overhaul of ICE
summary: In a debate, Jasmine Crockett and James Talarico differed in their political styles but agreed that violent immigration agents needed to be held to account.

title: Millions of Gallons of Raw Sewage Spills Into the Potomac River
summary: About 40 million gallons of untreated sewage a day has spilled into the river since a pipeline ruptured in Montgomery County, Md., on Monday, according to a utility company.

title: Frank Carone, a Brooklyn Power Broker, Is Under Federal Investigation
summary: Federal prosecutors and the F.B.I. are scrutinizing Mr. Carone, who served as chief of staff during Eric Adams’s first year as mayor of New York.

title: Interest in Law School Is Surging. A.I. Makes the Payoff Less Certain.
summary: The number of applicants has risen more than 40 percent over the last two years, despite new limits on student loans and uncertainty over how artificial intelligence will affect legal work.
